column2:
"I'm sorry for my selfish requests at
times when you are around."

"For me, I kindda lose sight of the
boundaries when it comes to cooking..."

"However, I would not give in even if it
comes to my attention. I look forward
to the Falcobone that’s about this size."

"Please try to fulfil my request in
whatever way you can!"

"私のわがままに付き合わせて
ごめんなさいね。"

"私、料理のこととなると
見境がつかなくなっちゃうみたいで……"

"でも、わかっていても譲れないの。
それぐらいファルカボネに
期待してるのよ。"
"どうか私の願いを叶えてちょうだいね！"
